predictions.text: ICE Brent front-month settlement will close between $78 and $90 per barrel on 2025-09-16.
predictions.verification_criteria: Verify the 2025-09-16 official ICE Brent front-month settlement price from ICE or Bloomberg; success if it is >= $78 and <= $90.
monitoring_signals: OPEC+ production guidance and Russia export data
Headlines from Trump-Putin summit affecting sanctions or supply
predictions.rationale: Summit optics unlikely to shift supply near term; OPEC+ constraints cap big moves.

predictions.text: At the September 2025 FOMC meeting, the Fed will change the target range by no more than 25 bps (i.e., either hold or adjust ±25 bps, not ≥50 bps).
predictions.verification_criteria: Compare the target federal funds rate range in the post-meeting FOMC statement against the pre-meeting range; success if the absolute change is 0 or 25 bps.
monitoring_signals: Core PCE and CPI monthly prints pre-meeting
predictions.rationale: Fed signals caution; macro data mixed, making outsized moves unlikely.

predictions.text: By 2025-10-31, at least two U.S.-listed tech IPOs (NYSE/Nasdaq) with IPO valuations ≥ $1B will close their first trading day ≥10% above offer price.
predictions.verification_criteria: Count U.S.-listed tech IPOs priced by 2025-10-31 with IPO valuation ≥ $1B; verify first-day close vs. offer price using exchange data or prospectuses; success if count ≥2.
monitoring_signals: Proposed price ranges vs. demand (order book coverage)
predictions.rationale: Window has reopened with strong demand; sustained risk appetite likely yields multiple strong debuts.

predictions.text: From 2025-08-15 close to 2025-09-30 close, the Philadelphia Semiconductor Index (SOX) will underperform the S&P 500 by at least 3 percentage points.
predictions.verification_criteria: Compute % change: SOX and S&P 500 closing levels on 2025-08-15 and 2025-09-30. Success if (SOX% - S&P% ) ≤ -3.0 pp.
monitoring_signals: Semi capex guide from AMAT, LRCX, ASML
U.S. export controls and licensing news
Memory pricing trends and inventory data
predictions.rationale: Weak semi-cap guidance and policy headwinds raise downside risk vs. broad market.

predictions.text: The MBA Refinance Index 4-week average for the week ending 2025-09-19 will be at least 10% higher than the 4-week average for the week ending 2025-08-15.
predictions.verification_criteria: Using MBA weekly reports, compute 4-week moving averages for weeks ending 2025-08-15 and 2025-09-19; success if later average ≥ 1.10x earlier.
monitoring_signals: Freddie Mac Primary Mortgage Market Survey (PMMS) 30-year rate
Lender rate sheets and lock volumes
predictions.rationale: Improving mortgage rates should spur incremental refinance activity despite tighter underwriting.

predictions.text: California’s August 2025 unemployment rate will be at least 5.4% in the BLS state employment release.
predictions.verification_criteria: Check BLS LAUS state unemployment rate for California, August 2025 (released mid-September); success if rate ≥ 5.4%.
monitoring_signals: State-level payroll and labor force participation
Job openings data in CA metros
predictions.rationale: Persistent tech softness and regional divergence suggest elevated unemployment persists near current highs.

predictions.text: OpenAI will announce completion of a secondary share sale of at least $5B at an implied valuation between $450B and $550B by 2025-10-31.
predictions.verification_criteria: Confirm via OpenAI/company press release or major financial media that a ≥$5B secondary transaction closed, with stated valuation within $450–$550B, by the deadline.
monitoring_signals: Regulatory filings or tender offer documents
Press reports on pricing and oversubscription
predictions.rationale: Investor appetite for AI remains strong despite frothy conditions; negotiations already advanced.
